static String versionStr ()

Detailed Description

Various methods for getting data from CRANE records and putting data into CRANE records, for big-endian data. Big-endian is also network byte order.

Version:
Id
ProtocolDataBigEndian.java,v 1.5 2005/04/08 12:48:10 guyg Exp

Implements com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ProtocolData.

00114                                     {
00115         byte [] valueBytes = value.getAddress();
00116         if (valueBytes.length != 4) {
00117             throw new UnknownHostException(value.toString() + " not IPv4 - length=" +
00118                                            valueBytes.length);
00119         }
00120         record[offset  ] = valueBytes[0];
00121         record[offset+1] = valueBytes[1];
00122         record[offset+2] = valueBytes[2];
00123         record[offset+3] = valueBytes[3];
00124     }
